feature.label: Code Modifier Feature
feature.description:
This Plugin can be used to convert JUnit 3 TestCases to JUnit 4 TestCases -Removes TestCase parent class and the "junit.framework.TestCase" import -setUp method adds @Before annotation and its import makes method public -tearDown method adds @After annotation and its import makes method public -test methods adds @Test annotations and its import Adds static imports for the assert* methods
This Plugin is also able to remove old non-javadoc comments in the sourcecode
